name: Minimal Dodgers
description:
Minimal Dodgers is our first gamejam game, we worked hard with some more people and make this little cool game in 48 hours.

Programmers:

-Lead Programmer and Game Designer:

Aldhair Vera Camacho

-Support Programmer:

Renato Castillo (https://goo.gl/sFfYvZ)

Artists:

-Main Artist:

Sofia Ismodes( https://o-alexr-o.deviantart.com/ )

-ArtSupport and Sofia's coach:

Ana Lucía

Musicians:

-Alfredo

-Steven (https://goo.gl/Yeyia2)

This game works on android, and also in touchable screen laptops
